title: ._. I hope the Victorious Skin is not Vayne because I would be dissapointed.
body:
Lets keep Vayne Winrate High soo we have a reason to give her a Victorious Skin.

The 2 ADC I want the skin to be released upon is Sivir or Jinx.
They have been impactful through the season and it would be unfair to not give them the skin.
They have been countlessly nerfed but still seem to have a high pick rate and winrate.
Vayne didn`t do anything at all during the whole season until the Meta shifted in her Favor and made her a complete obnoxious monster in Solo Q.
Of course she is mostly a high priority pick but we can`t seem to ban her because of terrifying champions we must absolutly ban in Solo Q no matter what.
{{champion:122}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:72}} {{champion:114}} 
This leaves 1 spot free for a ban.
That spot is mostly depending on laners Decision.
So it can vary from times to times.

replies.body:
It's going to be an adc. We need an adc!

What do you guys think of Urgot?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Mirross,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0F1L1jds,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-09-11T23:48:18.361+0000)
>
> It's going to be an adc. We need an adc!
> 
> What do you guys think of Urgot?

give it to omen
How about {{champion:119}} He doesn't get enough love
Draven doesn't need a skin to be Victorious. ;P
Nah you didn't get it. The victorious skin becomes Dravened.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Mirross,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0F1L1jds,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-09-11T23:48:18.361+0000)
>
> It's going to be an adc. We need an adc!
> 
> What do you guys think of Urgot?


You mean mid lane anti assassin ad caster tank assassin fighter utility marksman?

Lets be honest here, it better not be. You guys have always said you do not want to give urgot a skin cause of his model is going to change. A skin that is for X player base only is going to send people nuts (not in a good way). Most of the passionate urgot players are silver/bronze. 

The second problem with this is that he was run not for his marksman qualities. He is a range tankie brusier; after range he has nothing in common with marksmans.

> [{quoted}](name=Angry Monster,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0F1L1jds,comment-id=00090006,timestamp=2015-09-12T00:55:45.791+0000)
>
> Lets be honest here, it better not be. You guys have always said you do not want to give urgot a skin cause of his model is going to change. A skin that is for X player base only is going to send people nuts (not in a good way). Most of the passionate urgot players are silver/bronze. 
> 
> The second problem with this is that he was run not for his marksman qualities. He is a range tankie brusier; after range he has nothing in common with marksmans.

He is the closest thing to an anti ADC we have lol. Ranged sniper that reduces damage of the people he fights instead of CCing them. Basically he makes ADCs lives hell.
Give it to Mordekaiser then, duh!

We all know it's going to be Sivir though, right?

Most consistently played AD Carry in the competitive scene since her rework.
Sivir or Tristana is my guess. But I hope Sivir because Victorious Tristana... Meh, I can't imagine it looking cool.
If I were to give it a ratio, I'd say it would be something like 60:30:10 Sivir**:**Jinx**:**Tristana

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Mirross,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0F1L1jds,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-09-11T23:48:18.361+0000)
>
> It's going to be an adc. We need an adc!
> 
> What do you guys think of Urgot?

im still lost on the part where you all decided to give both the championship and victorious skins to a marksman

Because ADC's have definitely been the premier and most important role this season! Right?

R-right?

Totally not top lane or jungle, or even support...
All of my friends would die, they love Urgot!
Yeah if he's shooting confetti or champagne with his Q.
What about Varus? He's seen a lot of midlane play.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Mirross,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0F1L1jds,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-09-11T23:48:18.361+0000)
>
> It's going to be an adc. We need an adc!
> 
> What do you guys think of Urgot?

Great now i have to clean the puke off of my carpet.
Give it to ezreal
Urgot to be kidding, right?

Why did you make both Victorious and championship skins this year for ADCs? I think that's pretty stupid. People that don't like ADC won't get to enjoy either of them and people who main ADC suddenly get 2 skins but they'll have to wait a way longer while for their next victorious/championship skin. It would be cooler to have 1 ADC this year and 1 next year.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Mirross,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0F1L1jds,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-09-11T23:48:18.361+0000)
>
> It's going to be an adc. We need an adc!
> 
> What do you guys think of Urgot?

Victorious {{champion:29}} with Blue Particles :
His W would throw a huge Trophie filled of Corrupted Toxic Blood (Blue) which breaks and flows.
His passive also would have Blue particles and Stacks would show Trophies.
B-b-b-b-b--b-But...... {{champion:112}} ious
the rule isnt the most banned champ is getting a very nice skin and few patchs after get completly nerfed ?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Mirross,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0F1L1jds,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-09-11T23:48:18.361+0000)
>
> It's going to be an adc. We need an adc!
> 
> What do you guys think of Urgot?

...teemos an adc!
now im begging you to make Urgot a skin...

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Mirross,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0F1L1jds,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-09-11T23:48:18.361+0000)
>
> It's going to be an adc. We need an adc!
> 
> What do you guys think of Urgot?

Why are you making jokes about the fact that Urgot has been unviable for 2 years and still not fixed?
Azir is technically a Marksmen, no? >.>
I still hope it's {{champion:110}} for making mid Marksmen a real thing.
please not jinx just any other adc other than jinx...
As long as you make him pretty
So there's going to be Championship and Victorious ADC skins??

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Mirross,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0F1L1jds,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-09-11T23:48:18.361+0000)
>
> It's going to be an adc. We need an adc!
> 
> What do you guys think of Urgot?

I think it should honestly be Graves. He shaped the meta very early on in the season and basically caused the tank meta.
Urgot isn't bad but he isn't a _relevant_ champion currently.
I'm pretty sure it's going to be Sivir, she's been the most impactful through the whole season of any ADC, both in solo queue and in competitive play.
It's Tristana.
Actually we should all know who is getting tge victorious skin by now, It's Draaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaven.
but draven has not been very relevant in the whole season at all

> [{quoted}](name=EmperorGilgamesh,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0F1L1jds,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-09-11T23:13:23.070+0000)
>
> but draven has not been very relevant in the whole season at all

Shush!  Draven is always relevant.
I'd say Sivir is the most likely choice, followed by Varus (for his mid-lane role) or Jinx.

I really wasn't looking forward to Kalista - I was willing to send a ticket for Riot to remove her from my owned list if she was the Victorious choice.  But now that she's no longer a candidate, I honestly don't care who gets it.  Vayne, Trist, or Jinx would be preferable, but I guess I could learn to like Sivir since she's probably the most likely of the group.
o3o omg isn't really going to be Victorious urgot Skin riot!?

Sivir and Trist make sense.

Inexpensive champions who have been in most competitive games.

Corki is possible as well, but doesn't have that *feeling* of it going to him.
Rob Blackblade needs it. He's a melee adc anyway so it works.
Its sivir, she was a constant and influential pick all season

I like sivir as she doesn't really have any good skins besides the christmas one. If you go based on what dominated meta it's Tristana, sivir, or kog maw. Kog and trist have loads of sweet skins to choose from.

lol Victorious Ashe? No way. Victorious Sivir or Victorious Vayne is pretty likely.

Of course, Riot could just be a bunch of scumbag trolls and release a Victorious Kalista along with Championship Kalista so you can pay for it or get it for free.
No champs will be having a Victorious/Championship skin at the same time. If they get one, then they obviously will never get the other.
I hope it's Kalista or Jinx so I get a free champion along with skin.
